hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RUN_BROKER_EXTENDED
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: In addition to the verification tests include the broker extended tests. This job will fail if the extended tests fail but the ami will still be registered.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RUN_RUNTIME_EXTENDED
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: In addition to the verification tests include the runtime extended tests. This job will fail if the extended tests fail but the ami will still be registered.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RUN_SITE_EXTENDED
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: In addition to the verification tests include the site extended tests. This job will fail if the extended tests fail but the ami will still be registered.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RUN_RHC_EXTENDED
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: In addition to the verification tests include the rhc extended tests. This job will fail if the extended tests fail but the ami will still be registered.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
EXTENDED_TESTS_ARRAY=() if $RUN_BROKER_EXTENDED then EXTENDED_TESTS_ARRAY+=(broker) fi if $RUN_RUNTIME_EXTENDED then EXTENDED_TESTS_ARRAY+=(runtime) fi if $RUN_SITE_EXTENDED then EXTENDED_TESTS_ARRAY+=(site) fi if $RUN_RHC_EXTENDED then EXTENDED_TESTS_ARRAY+=(rhc) fi
EXTENDED_TESTS="" for test in "${EXTENDED_TESTS_ARRAY[@]}" do if [ -z "$EXTENDED_TESTS" ] then EXTENDED_TESTS=$test else EXTENDED_TESTS=$EXTENDED_TESTS,$test fi done
# Delete the previous repo clone directories rm -rf li origin-dev-tools
# Clone the repos git clone git@github.com:openshift/li.git git clone git@github.com:openshift/origin-dev-tools.git
pushd li build/devenv clone_addtl_repos master --replace
opts="" if [ -z "$EXTENDED_TESTS" ] then opts=$opts" --terminate" fi
set +e build/devenv build devenv-test ${BUILD_NUMBER} --install_from_source --yum_repo=test $opts RESULT=$? set -e
if [ -n "$EXTENDED_TESTS" ] then if [ $RESULT -eq 0 ] then # Run the extended tests build/devenv test devenv-test_${BUILD_NUMBER} --include_extended="$EXTENDED_TESTS" --terminate else build/devenv terminate devenv-test_${BUILD_NUMBER} exit $RESULT fi fi
popd
